attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Isn't it about time that doctors stopped chargeing people on benifits thier charges for letters. We as disabled people with physical or Mental or learning problems are asked quite often for upto date letters from our GP's. The charges can range from £15 to £40 depending on the surgery that you attend. As a person on benifits cannot afford the charges. These charges should be included in their contracts so charges for letters do not happen again.
